resources.string: Select an item from the list below, then add filters:

This software is potentially damaging and is provided "AS IS" and without any expressed or implied warranties. In no event shall the copyright owner or contributors be liable for any damages as a result of this software. By using this software you agree to these terms.
Either, select the data already provided by the event application:
Enter a name to remember me by
Save data to pass using the OmniHandler
Enter the data to be inserted
Enter a name to remember this OmniHandler by
Pick a root event from the list below to start building your rule:
At least one action must be added.
Data field can not be empty.
OmniHandler name can not be empty.
All user settings will be lost. Continue?
OmniHandlers catch events that occur on the platform.
Select the name of the application whose events you want to catch using this OmniHandler.
Select the type of event that you want to catch.
Add filters to limit the events caught by this OmniHandler to a subset of events.\nWhen done adding filters, select \'Done\' to proceed.
Enter the data you want to use for this filter.
Select the type of filter you wish to apply.
Add actions that you want OmniDroid to spawn when the event is caught.\nWhen done adding actions, select \'Save\' to save this OmniHandler.
Select the application which will be used to respond for the given event.
Select the action that you want the selected catcher application to respond with.
Listed is the data that the action may need. Select each data type to set the data to store there. When finished, select \'Done\' to proceed.
Select from the data provided from the event application, or enter data in manually (ex. 12125550000)
Please enter your username and password and select the check box to remember it
